categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: The "Wanderer" was a human male Jedi who carried a green-bladed lightsaber and a shield.

The Wanderer is a character that appeared in the 2019 middle-grade novel Myths & Fables. According to author George Mann, there were discussions about the character of the Wanderer being Qui-Gon Jinn, though whether or not it was actually Jinn was open to interpretation.
